SELECT
-- 级联表的字段 ,yonghu.yonghu_name as yonghuName ,yonghu.sex_types as sexTypes ,yonghu.bumen_types as bumenTypes ,yonghu.yonghu_id_number as yonghuIdNumber ,yonghu.yonghu_phone as yonghuPhone ,yonghu.yonghu_photo as yonghuPhoto ,yonghu.yonghu_role as yonghuRole ,zhiliaowendang.zhiliaowendang_name as zhiliaowendangName ,zhiliaowendang.zhiliaowendang_photo as zhiliaowendangPhoto ,zhiliaowendang.zhiliaowendang_daxiao as zhiliaowendangDaxiao ,zhiliaowendang.zhiliaowendang_file as zhiliaowendangFile ,zhiliaowendang.yonghu_id as yonghuId ,zhiliaowendang.zhiliaowendang_content as zhiliaowendangContent
FROM zhiliaowendang_collection a left JOIN yonghu yonghu ON a.yonghu_id = yonghu.id left JOIN zhiliaowendang zhiliaowendang ON a.zhiliaowendang_id = zhiliaowendang.id
and a.zhiliaowendang_id = #{params.zhiliaowendangId}
and a.yonghu_id = #{params.yonghuId}
and DATE_FORMAT(a.insert_time, '%Y-%m-%d %H:%T:%s') >= DATE_FORMAT(#{params.insertTimeStart}, '%Y-%m-%d %H:%T:%s')
and DATE_FORMAT(a.insert_time, '%Y-%m-%d %H:%T:%s') <= DATE_FORMAT(#{params.insertTimeEnd} , '%Y-%m-%d %H:%T:%s')
and yonghu.yonghu_name like CONCAT('%',#{params.yonghuName},'%')
and yonghu.sex_types = #{params.sexTypes}
and yonghu.bumen_types = #{params.bumenTypes}
and yonghu.yonghu_id_number like CONCAT('%',#{params.yonghuIdNumber},'%')
and yonghu.yonghu_phone like CONCAT('%',#{params.yonghuPhone},'%')
and yonghu.yonghu_role like CONCAT('%',#{params.yonghuRole},'%')
and zhiliaowendang.zhiliaowendang_name like CONCAT('%',#{params.zhiliaowendangName},'%')
and zhiliaowendang.zhiliaowendang_daxiao like CONCAT('%',#{params.zhiliaowendangDaxiao},'%')
and zhiliaowendang.yonghu_id = #{params.yonghuId}
and zhiliaowendang.zhiliaowendang_content like CONCAT('%',#{params.zhiliaowendangContent},'%')
order by a.${params.orderBy} desc
